description.value:
You can use this trait to take the Help action as a bonus action, and you can do so a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Starting at 3rd level, choose one of the options below each time you take the Help action with this trait:

Passage. You and the creature you help each increase your walking speeds by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

Overbear. Until the start of your next turn, the first time the creature you help hits a target with an attack roll, that target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes within the next minute.

Refuge. You and the creature you help each gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 1d6 plus your proficiency bonus.

Starting at 5th level, you increase the range of this special Help action to 30 feet.
